items.title: 'Shocking, pathetic and embarrassing' - can Nuno save West Ham?

items.title: Six points clear but still 'more to come' from Hearts

items.title: McGinn's first Premier League double sends Villa second
items.summary: John McGinn gets two goals and Ollie Watkins scores on his 250th appearance for Aston Villa, inflicting a fourth straight league defeat upon Nottingham Forest.

items.title: Brighton end winless spell with victory over Burnley
items.summary: Brighton end their six-game winless run with a comfortable victory over struggling Burnley in the Premier League.

items.title: Wolves beat West Ham to earn first league win of the season
items.summary: Wolves secure a first Premier League win of the season at the 20th attempt as they make light work of fellow strugglers West Ham at Molineux.

items.title: Rice strikes twice as Arsenal beat Bournemouth
items.summary: Declan Rice scores twice, as Premier League leaders Arsenal come from behind to beat Bournemouth following early error.

items.summary: At times during England's Ashes defeat in Australia it has looked like Ben Stokes is a lion leading lambs and his team-mates must step up, writes chief cricket reporter Stephan Shemilt.

items.title: Samsung Display finally brings V-Stripe subpixel layout to QD-OLED â€” mass production of new 1,300-nit 34-inch ultrawide panel also boosts text clarity
items.summary: QD-OLED monitors have historically faced text clarity issues due to their unorthodox subpixel layouts, which are a result of the way the OLED stack is layered. Samsung Display is finally fixing that with its first 34-inch ultrawide panel featuring a vertical stripe subpixel layout, similar to typicâ€¦

From compact offerings with flagship specs to established Ultra options from the likes of Samsung and a great selection of budget options, 2025 did not disappoint. And while Apple dominated the tablet sphere inâ€¦

items.title: IPL side KKR release Mustafizur after BCCI request
items.summary: IPL side Kolkata Knight Riders release Bangladesh bowler Mustafizur Rahman after being instructed to do so by the Board of Control for Cricket in India.

items.title: There will be no new Asus phones this year, report claims
items.summary: The latest Asus smartphone is the Zenfone 12 Ultra, which launched in February of last year. With that in mind, you may have been expecting a Zenfone 13 Ultra, or an ROG Phone 10 series to arrive soon, but according to a new report, you'll be disappointed. Apparently Asus will not be launching any â€¦

items.title: Women's game did not need 'Battle of Sexes' - Swiatek
items.summary: Iga Swiatek says tennis did not need the 'Battle of the Sexes' between Nick Kyrgios and Aryna Sabalenka as the women's game "stands on its own".

items.title: 'In 20 years I've seen leaps in human performance but frightening climate change'
items.summary: Ski Sunday presenter Ed Leigh on the changes in women's sport, climate and technology during 20 years with the iconic BBC Sport programme.

items.title: 'I needed them and they were there' - when young players find new homes
items.summary: BBC Sport explores how young footballers build bonds with second families when they leave home to sign for a new club on their path to the top.

items.title: Latest Samsung Galaxy S26 series rumor brings good news for potential buyers
items.summary: Some flagships launched in 2025 were considerably more expensive than their predecessors, and the story won't be different with the phones launching this year, either, due to rising component costs, among other factors. The upcoming Samsung Galaxy S26 series was also expected to get a price hike, bâ€¦

items.title: 'Never did I think one day I'd be playing in Spain'
items.summary: Espanyol winger Tyrhys Dolan speaks to Elizabeth Conway about his journey from non-league football to La Liga.

items.title: Stokes tells England to not be 'insular' in Sydney
items.summary: Captain Ben Stokes says his England players should not be protective of their positions in the final Ashes Test against Australia in Sydney.

items.title: Poco officially reveals more M8 specs
items.summary: Poco is making the M8 official on January 8 (how fitting!), and ahead of that it's now officially revealed more of the phone's specs. It has a 6.77-inch 3D curved OLED screen with 1080x2392 resolution, 120Hz refresh rate, and 3,200-nit peak brightness, and the brand even claims this is the segment'â€¦

items.title: 2025 Winners and losers: vivo
items.summary: 2025 was a good year for vivo as it continued to innovate and upgrade on its solid lineup of devices. But the maker also faced challenges, like delivering its many great phones to markets outside of China and India. A great showing overall, but not without some losses. Winner and loser: vivo X200 Uâ€¦

items.title: Motorola teases special World Cup Razr, here's when it's launching
items.summary: Last month an upcoming Motorola Razr smartphone with the FIFA World Cup 2026 logo on the back surfaced, and today the brand has started teasing this release. The co-branding is very visible in the quick video below, and thankfully Motorola has also revealed when we should expect the device to becomâ€¦

items.title: MediaTek Dimensity 7100 SoC is official
items.summary: MediaTek has quietly unveiled the Dimensity 7100 chipset, presumably the successor to the 7050. The 7100 comes with an octa-core CPU with four Arm Cortex-A78 cores clocked at up to 2.4GHz and four Cortex-A55 cores clocked at up to 2GHz. The CPU is paired with the Mali-G610MC2 GPU. The SoC supports â€¦

items.summary: Ahead of CES, today Samsung has unveiled the Freestyle+ projector, which is portable. It comes with a peak brightness of 430 ISO lumens, which isn't much - basically fine for a dark room but won't let you see a lot if there's ambient lighting around. That said, it is almost twice as bright as Samsuâ€¦

And now this feature has actually been confirmed by One UI 8.5, the build that the S26 Ultra will be running when itâ€¦

That's because the Nord 6 has already been certified for sale by SIRIM in Malaysia, the GCF, and TDRA in the UAE. These certificationsâ€¦

items.summary: From Tom Aspinall to Paddy Pimblett to Dakota Ditcheva - BBC Sport looks at how the big stories in MMA may play out in 2026.

items.summary: Epilogue just announced pre-orders for the SN Operator, a USB-C cartridge reader that lets you play and back up your SNES game library to your computer.

items.title: U.S. allows TSMC to import chipmaking equipment to its China fabs â€” Samsung, SK hynix likewise receive go signal from Commerce Department
items.summary: The U.S. Department of Commerce didn't renew the validated end-user status of these chipmakers, requiring them to acquire annual licenses to import chipmaking tools containing U.S. tech into their Chinese fabs.

items.summary: Upgraded safety systems make modern lasers easier to trust and easier to recommend.

items.summary: ASRock, usually known for producing motherboards, is set to debut its own AIOs at CES 2026, including flagship models featuring LCD screens. It's unclear if ASRock is licensing Asetek's pump designs, and whether it will compete against affordable brands like Thermalright.

items.summary: Target is offering the Logitech G502 Hero for $35.99 with a complimentary $20 gift cardâ€”effectively bringing your cost down to just $15.99 for this top-rated gaming mouse.

items.summary: British startup Space Forge has just successfully turned on its first in-orbit furnace, reaching 1,000 degrees Celsius in space. This is a crucial first step for the company in studying the feasibility of manufacturing chips in space.

items.summary: Nvidia's CUDA 13.1 introduces CUDA Tile, a new tile-centric programming path that elevates GPU kernel development above SIMT. items.summary: Chinese memory maker CXMT prepares to file for IPO in Beijing, aiming to raise $4.2 billion USD in order to expand production and fund next-gen DRAM development.
